name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior DevOps Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in leveraging cloud platforms such as **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** to build and maintain high-performance, scalable solutions. Proficient in using **Terraform** for infrastructure as code and skilled in CI/CD practices with **GitHub Actions**, I ensure seamless deployments and effective system monitoring using tools like **Datadog** and **CloudWatch**. Additionally, I specialize in containerization with **Docker** and maintain operational reliability through incident management tools such as **Sentry** and **PagerDuty**. My solid background as a Full Stack Developer, adept in **Python** (using **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**, **SQLAlchemy**) and modern frontend frameworks like **Next.js**, enables me to understand and streamline development and operational workflows. With proven skills in microservices architecture and a commitment to implementing zero-trust networking principles, I am dedicated to delivering secure and efficient DevOps practices.
